attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the British Government to just listen to the British public. Instead of the government running England let the public run it for a change. If we want the world to come out of a rescission let the public have their say.

rejection.details: Your petition must make a point about government policy. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
